backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing projects, user profiles, authorization, storage mixins, and filtered project listing APIs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old project and profile formats to new structures with added settings and default values.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components and feature modules.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry component providing theming, query client, error boundary, and authenticated routing.
frontend/src/features/app-shell/CreatorD: Dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, top bar, preview canvas, and section‑based control panels for creator tools.
frontend/src/features/app-shell/SidebarN: Renders the sidebar navigation with section buttons and highlights the active item.
frontend/src/features/app-shell/TopBar.t: Displays the top navigation bar with project save handling, user menu, and project loading logic.
frontend/src/features/audio/AnalysisStat: Shows audio analysis controls including sensitivity and frequency multipliers with sliders.
frontend/src/features/audio/AudioEditing: Provides trim and fade controls for the loaded audio via sliders.
frontend/src/features/audio/AudioUploadP: Handles audio file upload and basic playback controls for the audio engine.
frontend/src/features/audio/useAudioEngi: Implements a Zustand-powered audio engine handling loading, decoding, playback, trimming, and fades.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Gates access to the app, showing login UI until the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupM: Prompts new users to enter and save their profile name in a modal dialog.
frontend/src/features/background/Backgro: Provides UI to configure background type, colors, gradients, images, and particle settings.
frontend/src/features/background/backgro: Canvas helpers for rendering solid colors, linear gradients, and scaled images as backgrounds.
frontend/src/features/background/particl: Implements a particle overlay system with density, intensity controls and render/update logic.
frontend/src/features/background/useBack: Zustand store managing background settings including colors, gradients, images, and particle options.
frontend/src/features/errors/ErrorBounda: React error boundary that displays a styled fallback UI and allows page reload on error.
frontend/src/features/export/exportEstim: Provides rough estimates for export file size and render time plus formatting utilities.
frontend/src/features/export/ExportPanel: UI panel for configuring video export settings and showing estimated file size and render time.
frontend/src/features/export/exportRende: Captures canvas frames and sequentially renders them into an array of image buffers.
frontend/src/features/export/ffmpeg/ffmp: Placeholder FFmpeg client simulating load and progress but throwing errors for actual video export.
frontend/src/features/export/useExportQu: Zustand store handling queued export jobs with status, progress, and job lifecycle controls.
frontend/src/features/overlays/overlayRe: Canvas renderers for text, logo, and watermark overlays with animation, positioning, scaling, and shadow effects.
frontend/src/features/overlays/OverlaysC: UI panel for editing overlay text, branding, font, position, size, animation, and logo settings.
frontend/src/features/overlays/useOverla: Zustand store defining overlay settings, mutators, logo handling, and JSON serialization/deserialization.
frontend/src/features/persistence/applyL: Applies loaded project data to background, overlay, and visualizer settings via their stores.
frontend/src/features/persistence/projec: Encodes frontend background, branding, and tunnel settings strings into backend-compatible format with fallbacks.
frontend/src/features/preview/PreviewCan: React component rendering a canvas for visualizer preview and initializing the engine.
frontend/src/features/projects/ProjectsP: UI for listing, creating, and selecting projects with async queries and toast notifications.
frontend/src/features/projects/useCurren: Zustand store tracking the currently selected project ID.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/B: Renders a horizontal bar equalizer with color‑coded bars based on audio data.
Renders a vertical bar equalizer centered horizontally using audio data.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/C: Draws a circular spectrum of radial bars around the canvas center using audio frequencies.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/M: Renders a soft radial glow and a simple waveform based on averaged audio amplitude.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/P: Generates reactive colored particles whose position and size vary with audio data.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/R: Draws multiple neon radial rings with audio-driven point distortions and shifting hues.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/T: Implements a WebGL-based animated tunnel shader that reacts to audio levels.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/modes/W: Renders a simple continuous waveform line across the canvas using raw audio samples.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/useVisu: Manages visualizer engine state, initialization, audio linking, and mode/sensitivity updates.
frontend/src/features/visualizer/Visuali: UI panel for selecting visualizer mode with WebGL checks and descriptive options.
Main visualizer engine managing canvas rendering, modes, WebGL tunnel, audio analysis, and animation loop.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on user profiles and projects using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, color variables, and Tailwind layers for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorDashboard.tsx: Renders the creator dashboard wrapped in authentication and profile-setup flow.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the marketing landing page with login buttons, hero section, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project goals, architecture notes, implemented features, and current state version.
